2101610.name: Shadow Seven
2101610.description:
Shadow Seven is a real time tactics game where the seven dwarfs is a group of rascals. Each of them is a specialist with a very narrow focus, and during missions their cooperation is often essential. Get ready for new techniques for neutralizing enemies as well as interesting interaction with the environment.

Follow the adventures of a fledgling group in a dwarven realm where decay has prevailed for generations. No ruler is safe in their land where change often comes with speed of a shot arrow and no one has a long and peaceful reign ahead of them...

Through a series of crucial events, the seven dwarfs become a striking force against crooked justice and end up having to do good against their will!

  • Story: Imagine the 7 dwarfs as the biggest outlaws in their world before they met Snow White. The whole story started differently than you would have imagined!
  • Setting: We come up with a location of dwarves outside the High Fantasy rules.
  • Music: Original music recorded with typical Caucasian instruments.
  • Characters: Unique characters with 3 iconic abilities and environmental advantages. Balanced game play. Level full of obstacles that are manageable by the special abilities of the main characters.
  • Enemies: Several enemy specialization types. Hide from bloodthirsty dogs, find your way in neighborhoods closely watched by snipers and defeat the powerful defenders.
  • Grand Finale: Multi-layered final mission (all 7 characters in one mission). Unlock bonus missions after completing main story.
2101610.supported_languages:
英语*, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西, 俄语
*具有完全音频支持的语言
